Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/63rd
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 63rd, Loomis, Marquette and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 63rd, Loomis, Marquette and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/63rd.

Allow extra travel time.
